title: Scorpio
description: As my bestie likes to say, the way to get over a man is to get under another. But getting under a man like Scott Danger might be more than I can handle.He’s the heir to Danger Enterprises. Possessive, ambitious, and passionate, he'll totally eat me alive. He’s a predator caged in gilded threads, and I want to run just so he’ll chase me . . . catch me . . . take me. Shit. I’m in so much trouble, but I think I like it. This might turn into a disaster. We might crash and burn. And while Mr. Danger thinks I need saving, I’m no damsel in distress.I wasn’t looking for trouble, but trouble seems to have found me.Mr. Danger is a full length Romance with an HEA, no cheating, and no cliffhanger.
author: Lauren Landish
